short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Turn your browser screen into a whiteboard

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Browser board is a one-stop educational tool that allows you to do many things, on any page! You can create widgets on any page such as:
- Timer
- Stopwatch
- Student birthday calendar
- Random name selector
- Protractor
- Calculator (via Desmos)
- Notepad windows

In addition, browser board also allows you to draw on any page, create rectangles, circles, and arrows.

Browser board works on most pages, but may not load correctly on some; please note that it is still being developed.
